repairedDockerfile:
# See https://github.com/docker-library/docs/tree/master/php#pecl-extensions 
FROM php:7.1-fpm 
RUN pecl install redis \  
&& pecl install xdebug \  
&& docker-php-ext-enable redis xdebug 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
zip \
unzip \
nginx && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y sudo \
htop \
vim \
iputils-ping \
net-tools \
mysql-client \
sqlite3 \
postgresql-client \
mc && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY nginx/* /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/ 
COPY php-fpm/xdebug/xdebug.ini /etc/php/7.1/mods-available/xdebug.ini 

# WORKDIR /var/www/html 
ENV TERM xterm
